title: Worlds points question / problem.  Requesting communication from Riot.
body:
I currently have 135 Worlds points and I was going to get the Golden Champion Ashe skin.  Will there be enough missions for me to get the required 320 points before the 26th of October?  I work for the government and I am being sent out somewhere.  I can provide documentation because I am sure you all hear all kinds of excuses/reasons.  I also do not want to go into specifics on the boards where just anyone can read it.  I would love a PM or email or something from Riot so we might be able to talk more about this.

Thank you.

Very Respectfully,

Argent Tnega

replies.body:
It mostly depends on if you've been able to complete every mission so far, and especially whether or not you bought the Master Pass. We won't be able to extend the event or missions most likely as that'd be unfair to everyone else who couldn't get their missions extended.

If you want to talk about what's pulling you away from League more in depth to see if that changes anything, you should definitely hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where that information will be kept private. That way, we can talk one on one to see if there's any way we could help you out!!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VaYG2Ic3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-06T03:23:36.095+0000)
>
> It mostly depends on if you've been able to complete every mission so far, and especially whether or not you bought the Master Pass. We won't be able to extend the event or missions most likely as that'd be unfair to everyone else who couldn't get their missions extended.
> 
> If you want to talk about what's pulling you away from League more in depth to see if that changes anything, you should definitely hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where that information will be kept private. That way, we can talk one on one to see if there's any way we could help you out!!

Thanks and done.
